name: DMM Apex Hammer Ice Tool
description: A radically curved tool for outrageous steep lines and progressive mixed routes. The Apex offers superb balance and technical precision for big mountain routes and mixed test pieces. The curved shaft gets around around bulging cauliflower and mushrooms while still feeling balanced and solid. They can be leashed for more traditional climbing, but they shine when unleashed for progress up modern climbs.Hot-forged handle is shaped for ergonomic comfort.Shaft shape provides high clearance and good reach on steep angles.T-rated shaft and pick.Dual handrests for comfort and reach when climbing leashless.Removable pick weights add punch on hard ice.Grip tape included.Ice picks included. Mixed picks available separately.
